column1: #Text=Gyatso says : " Your aim has improved greatly , my young pupil . "
#Text=I survived in the iceberg for that long .
#Text=" Aang says : " Katara , whoever 's in there might help figure out this Avatar thing !
#Text=" Sokka says : " And whoever 's in there might have a medley of delicious cured meats !
#Text=" Sokka says : " I do n't suppose you have a key ?
#Text=" Aang says : " The key , Sokka , is airbending .
